[stream of consciousness]

Opensource Libraries

Objective-C

AFNetworking: Network Library
AKTabBarController: Adaptative and customizable tab bar for iOS
ASIHttpRequest: CFNetwork API Wrapper
BlocksKit: Blocks categories
Chameleon: Port of Apple's UIKit for iOS
CMUnistrokeGestureRecognizer: A port of the $1 Unistroke Recognizer (aka Dollar Gesture Recognizer) to iOS as a UIGestureRecognizer
CocoaLumberjack: Log Framework
Godzippa: GZip Compression / Decompression Category for NSData
HMSegmentedControl: A drop-in replacement for UISegmentedControl mimicking the style of the segmented control used in Google Currents.
HockeyKit: Ad-Hoc Update Framework
inputtoolbar: Message-like Input View
Mantle: Simpler Model Layer MBProgressHUD: HUD Indicator View
mogenerator: Make CoreData Easier
NUI: Style iOS apps with a style sheet
RichContentLabel: A HTML stylized label with fully image layout support without using UIWebView
QuickDialog: Useful UI Elements, with JSON Builder
RestKit: RESTful Client Library
Sequencer:An iOS library for asynchronous flow control.
STTweetLabel: A custom UILabel view controller for iOS with certain words tappable like Twitter (#Hashtag, @People and http://www.link.com/page)
THObserversAndBinders: Easy, lightweight, object-based key-value observing (KVO) and key-value binding (KVB) for iOS and Mac OS X
TICoreDataSync: Automatic synchronization for Core Data Apps, between any combination of Mac OS X and iOS: Mac to iPhone to iPad to iPod touch and back again
TITokenField: An iOS version of the NSTokenField (See To: field in Mail and Messages)

Others

AutoresizeMask-for-Xcode: Simple xCode plugin to visualize view autoresizing if it's set from code
Dash Plugin for Xcode: Use Dash Instead of Xcode's Own Documentation Viewer
iOS6 Fonts: iOS 6 Fonts List
UIKit-Artwork-Extractor: Extract UIKit artwork and emoji symbols into png files, generate glossy buttons png files
